allPortfolioInfo.about: Innkeeper is a job-tech venture that provides talent development and matching services to corporations and startups in other to support them with top African talents for tech and tech-related roles. Innkeeper focuses on upskilling youths with in-demand tech skills for improved employability and to close talent skill gaps

allPortfolioTractions.title: Tech talent trained.
allPortfolioTractions.details: Since February 2021, innkeepers have trained over 300+ young African talents for tech and tech-related roles.

allPortfolioTractions.title: Alumni employed
allPortfolioTractions.details: Innkeeper has placed over 80% of our trainees in jobs, either internships or entry roles.

allPortfolioTractions.title: Offtakers
allPortfolioTractions.details: Innkeeper has placed her product in top-notch partner organizations across corporate and startups globally.

HavenPortfolioInfo.about: Haven Edu-Services is an extra-curricular childhood educational organization focused on providing training content related to Technology, Languages, and Arts for children/Pre-teenagers ages 4-16.

HavenPortfolioTractions.title: Active school partnerships
HavenPortfolioTractions.details: Haven Edu Services partners with schools to facilitate tech and art curriculum.

HavenPortfolioTractions.title: Summer Programs
HavenPortfolioTractions.details: Haven Edu services has had over 7 successful summer programs (Haven Creative summer, Haven Teen Tech and Partner School Summer).

HavenPortfolioTractions.title: Outsourced sessions
HavenPortfolioTractions.details: Leveraging on school partnership programs. Haven has trained over a 1000 students in robotics, coding, language and Taekwondo.

MindAfrikPortfolioInfo.about: MindAfrik is an online platform focused on mental health that connects certified and qualified counselors to people who need their services.

MindAfrikPortfolioTractions.title: Surveys
MindAfrikPortfolioTractions.details: Mind Afrik has conducted surveys to identify the core areas of interest where counseling would be required to help people improve their mental health.

MindAfrikPortfolioTractions.title: Consultants
MindAfrikPortfolioTractions.details: A team of multi-talented and professional counselors has been onboarded to attend to clients.

EaseSoilessPortfolioInfo.about: Ease soilless is a company dedicated to adding value to modern farming through the use of sustainable, environment-friendly soilless technology. We hope to make urban farming attractive to households and Nigerian youth.

EaseSoilessPortfolioTractions.title: Products Developed

LegalMoPortfolioInfo.about: LegalMO is a legal tech venture, promoting the legal health and promotion of SMEs and Startups by creating a platform where Startups and SMEs can access affordable legal services.
